text: "Margaritaville" is a 1977 song by Jimmy Buffett and taken from his seventh studio album Changes in Latitudes, Changes in Attitudes. It went to number 4 in Canada, number 8 in the United States, number 33 in New Zealand and number 98 in Australia. It has been covered by country singer Alan Jackson for his 1999 album Under the Influence. ==References== Category:1977 songs Category:Jimmy Buffett songs Category:Alan Jackson songs Category:Country rock songs
title: Margaritaville
